mapper.insert: insert into purchase (code, member_code, funding_code, price, qty, purchase_state, purchase_date, delivery_number, Courier) values (seq_no.nextval, #{memberCode}, #{fundingCode}, #{price}, #{qty}, #{purchaseState}, sysdate, #{deliveryNumber}, #{courier})
mapper.select: select f.title , m.name, m.addr, m.phone from funding f inner join member m on f.member_code = m.code where m.code = #{_parameter}
select count(*) from purchase where funding_code = #{_parameter}

select distinct p.delivery_number, p.courier,p.funding_code, m.id, m.name, m.addr, m.code from purchase p inner join member m on m.code=p.member_code where p.funding_code=#{fundingCode} and p.member_code= #{memberCode}
